writer.name: 蒂姆·特拉弗斯·霍金斯 Tim Travers Hawkins

director.name: 蒂姆·特拉弗斯·霍金斯 Tim Travers Hawkins

this_title: Persona: The Dark Truth Behind Personality Tests
trans_title: 人格测试背后的黑暗真相
introduction: Taking a personality test can provide useful insights into our sense of self, but many may not realize how deeply embedded personality assessments are in everything we do. PERSONA explores the unexpected origin story of America’s great obsession with personality testing, uncovering the intriguing history behind the world-famous Myers-Briggs Type Indicator while raising a slew o...
chinese_title: 人格测试背后的黑暗真相
foreign_title: Persona: The Dark Truth Behind Personality Tests
